Communication.description: I possess exceptional communication skills, recognizing that effective communication is pivotal for successfully managing projects with diverse peers from around the world. I honed these skills within the Microverse Community, where, over the course of 7 months, I had the opportunity to collaborate with individuals from various corners of the globe.

Full-stack Development.description: I embarked on my Full-stack journey in February 2023 with Microverse, and it has been a life-changing experience. Throughout this journey, we've collaboratively developed impressive applications while fostering strong relationships and effective communication among our peers, creating a truly interactive learning environment.

Education.description: I completed my 12th grade, but my deep-seated passion for programming and the ever-growing interest in the field led me to make a career switch. I have chosen web development as my path, opting for self-employment to pursue my passion and build a fulfilling career.

Resort app.description: A booking app that enables you to add, delete, and reserve resorts with full authentication for login/sign-up. It was completed through teamwork and communication.

Recipe app.description: The Recipe app is a helpful tool for creating recipes, managing ingredients, and tracking cooking time. It was completed through teamwork and collaboration.

Currency exchange app.description: Currency Exchange is a web app that enables currency conversion between different countries, offering a user-friendly interface to select and convert currencies. It also provides information on currency codes and associated country names.

Movies app.description: This is a movie and TV show listing project that retrieves all data from an API, and allows you to like and comment on them.
